text: CREAKING OF THE ROCKING CHAIR, back and forth, back and f as a JANE,23, sweet and fresh faced contented young woman HUMS a lullaby. Music from Mozart plays in the background Light from a passing car illuminates JANE, long dark hair slender, pretty and very much pregnant. Jane rubs her sto gently. She continues to hum and rock. Puts her hands on her 8 month swollen belly.
I'm going to make such a good mother for you. You are so special. I --
Jane pauses her chair mid stroke.
Jane stops rocking. Holds her breath. She turns toward th door not knowing what to expect. DOOR SLAMS open, vibrating against the wall. She turns in fear.

location: STUDIO APARTMENT OF EDDIE AND JANE

text: Jane lays in bed. GROANS. Turns on her side. A shiner on her left eye. On the bedside stand are flowers. Jane looks at the flowers and the crude card. CARD: Forgive me Sweet Pie. Jane smiles.
You okay, Janey?
He didn't know what he was doing.
HeвЂ™s hurting you. HeвЂ™s...heвЂ™s hurting...
He..HeвЂ™s..I'1l talk to you later. DOOR KNOB TURNS. She hangs up quickly as Eddie comes in bearing a breakfas tray.
Hey. You okay, babe? (sets the tray down) Here. Let me do that. (puts ice pack on her eye) She shrinks back as if afraid of being hit.
If you hadn't...
I shouldnвЂ™t have talked back to you.
And you know, you donвЂ™t do that. His fingers carass under her chin.
(nods ) The baby kicked today. You want to feel?
(touches her belly) Won't be much longer now. Maybe he'll come out with a wrench in his hand.  10 11 12
Baby is curled in her placenta.

location: STUDIO APARTMENT OF EDDIE AND JANE

text: Eddie leans over Jane, touching her face with love, feeli father's pride. He touches her stomach.

It's a girl. * (on his reaction) At least that's what the doctor said. * The flowers and vase he brought crash to the floor. Jane breaks out in sobs. Eddie storms out of the room as Jane looked glazed at the broken vase and the food over the bed.
Baby curled in her placenta, her eyes open.

location: STUDIO APARTMENT OF EDDIE AND JANE

text: Jane rubs her stomach.
It's okay, baby. * Jane crawls from the bed and tries to clean up the mess. Stripping the dirty bed, and still sobbing, she goes over the CD player and puts on her Mozart. *

Jane emerges from the shower, sans make up. She goes to t make up counter where everything has been put neatly in alphabetical order by Eddie. She accidently knocks a jar from its aligned space. Hastily, she looks around, fearfu that Eddie might notice. She nudges it back into place. She wipes the fog off the mirror. Her bruises from the da before are clearly visible. She frowns and begins applyin make up. ItвЂ™s not covering it up. She puts on more and more. The thick make up is now more obvious than the brui She speaks in a mantra to herself.  13 14 15
I love my husband. I do love him.

location: DARKNESS OF A BARELY LIT ROOM

text: Across the street the night lights of the liquor store go and off as the hours pass. Jane sits in the rocking chair going back and forth as she repeats her mantra. She's los in thought. The dinner table is perfectly set. The candles have burne low. She anxiously watches the street.

location: STUDIO APARTMENT OF EDDIE AND JANE

text: Jane has fallen asleep in the rocker. Her face is startin to show black and blue. She wakes and stares across the street.
(dulled) No, he's not here.
You okay?
Yeah. Sure. (forces a laugh)
I meant what I said. YouвЂ™re running out of time -
(alarmed) Martin---
You need to leave him. Listen...listen...
And who's going to take care of me. You?
My mama, she'll... I donвЂ™t know. Jane, you have to leave --  16
And who's going to take care of me? You?
I...you have to get out of there
I can't. He'd find me if I did.
Jane, the baby --

HeвЂ™s ..HeвЂ™s...I have to go. (abruptly hangs up) The door opens. Jane turns expectantly and starts to rise as the door ope She wears a long flowery skirt and long sleeved blouse. H hair is tied back with a bow.
That was just...
I know who it was.
Martin just called to --
Sit down, Bitch. I'm through with you and your lies. He advances toward her.
Eddie, please. The baby. He wipes a clean surface and looks at his finger, looking dust.
Clean this house. ItвЂ™s disgusting.
IвЂ™m ...IвЂ™m going to bed.  17
No, youвЂ™re not. Eddie grabs JaneвЂ™s arm.
Stop it, please! YouвЂ™re hurt- scaring me.
Sit down! Eddie pulls her arm towards the ground, with it her body follows. Jane resists and eases her arm from his grasp.

Bitch! He back-hands her against the jaw. The blow is severe. Ja buckles backwards, trips and SLAMS her head against the TABLEвЂ™S EDGE. She slumps to the floor, motionless. The carpet swells with blood.
Get up! Jane lies motionless.
Jane? Stop fooling. Jane, get up! Jane remains unconscious.
I was just kidding. (realizes sheвЂ™s gone) Fucking shit! SILENCE. Then, Eddie frantically rolls the carpet near her so that it lo like she tripped and pulls his cellphone out and dials 9-
Send help! My wifeвЂ™s fallen.

18 7. INT.EDDIEвЂ™S APARTMENT - A FEW MOMENTS LATER 18 TWO PARAMEDICS rush to Jane, quickly assessing the scene. Eddie sits silent, motionless on the bed; white, blank, s stare. The Paramedics kneel to Janes side. They quickly assess t situation and perform CPR with no hesitation. Their movem is sound, their skill precise. Martin rushes in.
What happened?
I...she tripped.
You ---
Shut the fuck up, Doofus. FIVE MINUTES PASS. An exhausted, somber Paramedic 1 leans down and takes Jan pulse. The cardiac monitor sounds a sharp pitched tone as beams a flat-line.
LetвЂ™s jolt her. The other nods as she applies the paddles to the chest.
Stand back! Jane's bodyвЂ™s jerk but there is nothing happening. Her eyes are wide open, the blood fills the carpet in sma gushes. One paramedic shakes his head вЂњnoвЂќ to the oth Janey is dead.
Do it again...please. Jane...she...

IвЂ™m sorry, Sir. Paramedic 1 removes her white, latex gloves. She applies sanitizer. The sound of the liquid glides out of the bott Eddie thinks he can hear it, for just a second.  8. Paramedic 1 notices small amounts of blood protruding fro Jane's mouth. SLOW MOTION: A drop hits the carpet. Eddie stands there, just staring.
Sir! Eddie jolts from his trance.
Did you do this?
No. (chills) I tell ya, she tripped. He looks from the paramedics to Martin. He listens with the stethoscope. A sharp TONE blasts against the room. ItвЂ™s startling. T
(whisper) ItвЂ™s beating. Eddie leans forward. Swallows hard.
SheвЂ™s alive? Eddie rubs his hands together, impatiently looks to the d eyeing an escape. The tone sounds again. Then again. The HEART BEAT of the baby can be heard through the dopler.
No. Its the baby. The babyвЂ™s heart is beating. Paramedic 1 takes the dopler and places it again on the stomach.
We have fetal movement. Strong. (then) This baby is kicking. LetвЂ™s get her moving. Now. Eddie backs away from his exit, towards the scene. He pee over the medics at JaneyвЂ™s eyes wide open.
Eddie. Eddie jolts.
(to Eddie) Step back. Give us some room.
What??
Step back!! JANE abruptly sits up, blood seeping from her wound. Eddi JOLTS with a SCREAM.

Tell me you love me, Eddie. Eddie cringes at her sight, trembling in a pulse of fear. opens his eyes. Empty. The room is empty. Paramedics GONE. Only the pool of bloo remains on the carpet where Jane once laid.
Eddie sits in his chair waiting form something, anything. has not slept and it shows. Martin paces the room. From the strong white GAZE of the hospital BRIGHT LIGHTS emerges a DOCTOR, male, 60s.
Mr. Hutchins? Eddie nods. The doctor sits. Martin sits down next to Edd and tries to comfort him but Eddie shrugs him off. Then,
Sir. We saved your baby.
WhatвЂ™s that supposed to mean? Jane is dead! (MORE)
19 10. EDDIE (cont'd) (Sobs ) Oh, my God. I loved her! I swear I did. I loved her.
Of course you did.
Fuck you! You didnвЂ™t even try to save her.
Eddie ...
You shut up, Doofus. When I want your opinion, IвЂ™1l ask. The doctor reluctantly shakes his head.
It was no...We performed an emergency c-section.
A little girl?
A healthy little girl.

What the hell am I supposed to do... INT. EDDIEвЂ™S APARTMENT - DAY. 19 SUPERIMPOSE: 4 YEARS LATER. Eddie drunk on the sofa. Little Janey, age 4, pounds with her pretend hammer into blocks and then picking up Jane and Eddie's wedding pictu and pounding it until the glass shatters. She looks at Ed directly. INTERCUT BETWEEN DOORWAY and LIVING ROOM AS NECESSARY. The door opens and Martin lets himself inside. Eddie catches the stare of his 4 year old daughter. Chill  11.
(whisper) Eddie. Eddie JOLTs quickly. Standing above him is Jane, BLOODIED holding a shard of glass.
No! Jane HAMMERS down the glass into EddieвЂ™s GUT. He buckle towards the wound.
Eddie? Eddie pulls the glass from his stomach. Blood pulls aroun his waist.
No. Jane is gone. In her place stands Janey, the 4 year old, holding the glass, SMILING. Eddie bolts upright.
Jane! His eyes wide open. NORMAL. Janey plays in the corner wit her hammer. She looks to her father and SMILES. Martin enters the room and bends down so that he's eye le with JANEY.
What are doing, Sweetheart? Janey playfully holds her hands up to Martin.
WhatвЂ™s the matter with, Eddie? Nightmare?

Yeah. Kind of. He reaches for his bottle of Scotch and starts to pour. Martin takes the bottle from him. There's a slight strugg Eddie nods. He glances again at JANEY, watching warily as plays with her toy hammer and blocks.  20 Eddie releases his grasp on the BOTTLE.
Yeah, youвЂ™re right. I donвЂ™t need a drink. INT. LIVING ROOM OF APARTMENT. DAY.
Eddie is on the phone with a crisis HOTLINE.
You donвЂ™t understand. IвЂ™m not crazy.
Have you had any alternative substances today?
DonвЂ™t give me that shit! IвЂ™m hearing voices! TheyвЂ™re real lady!
Are you a threat to yourself or others?
No, IвЂ™m not. (then) The kid is. 12. 20 He sees LITTLE JANEY (14) standing in the doorway, watchi him. Slowly, he puts down the phone. CLICK.
YouвЂ™re home. HeвЂ™s nervous.
Everything okay?
Just fine, Daddy. She returns a slow, half-witting smile.  21 13.

location: APARTMENT OF EDDIE AND LITTLE JANEY

text: Little Janey, 14, sits in the exact rocking chair where h mother sat. She reads Jane Eyre. On the desk is a picture her mother. It's uncanny how much the child looks like he mother, even to her hair style. Her hair has grown long Eddie stops in the doorway with groceries in his arms. He swallows hard as if seeing a ghost.
D'ya always gotta have a book in your hand, kid?
I like to read, Daddy. Didn't Mommy like to read, too?
(Stammers ) H...how would y...you know about y...your m...mother, kid?
Little Janey shrugs.
Martin told me.
(in a rush) I gota go out. There's spaghetti in the fridge.
Sure, Daddy.
I loved you, Eddie. Why did you hurt me?
(spins around) Whatja say?
Nothing, Daddy.
Stop playing games with my head, kid.
I donвЂ™t play games.  22 23 24 14.

location: APARTMENT OF EDDIE AND LITTLE JANEY

text: The room is bathed in moonlight. Wearing a long flowery s and blouse, similar to what her mother wore before her de Little Janey Puts on Mozart and sits in the rocker, rhythmically going back and forth. Her is tied back with bow. The rocker CREAKS BACK AND FORTH.
Eddie enters and blinks, barely able to see in the darken apartment.
What the...turn on the fuckin' lights. Not like I can't afford them.
No, leave them off. She stands and walks toward him, looking amazingly like h mother.
(drunk) Whereja get those clothes? Huh, where? He approaches her angrily, almost ready to rip them off. avoids him laughing and returns to the rocker.
(laughing) I found them. In a trunk. They were mother's, weren't they?
Take'm off.
No. Other kids have parties for their birthdays. But what do I have? A father who murdered my mother.  15.
Shut up! Turn that record off before I slap you one.

Oh, don't you like the music, Eddie? It was with mother's things. I'm going to kill you Eddie. Janey stands out of the rocker looking every bit like her mother. She walks forward. EddieвЂ™s face is white.
Get away from me! Go back! Get away!

Eddie, why did you have to be so cruel? Why did you have to kill me? I loved you, Eddie. He turns and looks for an escape, but sees none. With eac step she takes forward, he takes one back. He doesn't realize that he is nearing the carpet that Jane had falle on. He hits his head, just as Jane had. The force of his fall is so great that he just lies there eyes open. She kicks the rug over to look as if he has tripped, then picks up the phone.
My fatherвЂ™s fallen. Send help. She smiles. The End Titles at the end have the phone number.

Every fifteen minutes a woman is abused. Teens are not immune.  16. Violence against women happens in every culture and acros the socioeconomic board. DonвЂ™t be a victim.
